sn48.71-82:1.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ganga nadi pacinaninna pacinapona pacinapabbhara;
sn48.71-82:1.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo.
sn48.71-82:1.3: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo?
sn48.71-82:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddhindriyam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim,
sn48.71-82:1.8: pannindriyam bhaveti vivekanissitam viraganissitam nirodhanissitam vossaggaparinamim.
sn48.71-82:1.9: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu pancindriyani bhavento pancindriyani bahulikaronto nibbananinno hoti nibbanapono nibbanapabbharo”ti.
